title: Summer Love
description: Marissa spent every summer of her childhood away from home. One summer, while staying with her aunt, she met Chad, her cousin’s best friend. Chad was much older than she was and the definition of bad boy. Marissa didn’t see him for his past, but saw him as the person he could become. The following summer, they began dating, although they had to keep the relationship a secret. They didn’t know what would happen when summer ended and Marissa had to go back home, but they didn’t care. Chad’s past mistakes kept coming back to haunt him. Can their relationship survive all the obstacles in their way? Can Chad overcome his past? Will Marissa give up?
author: Harley Turner
